sub_title: Senior Manager - B2B Marketing Execution, Philips
summary:
Thank you for visiting my profile! I really appreciate you taking the time to check me out.

My name is Bartosz and I am an experienced Marketing, Strategy & Commercial Excellence professional, seeking to improve the world and add value to people & organizations I interact with.

By education, I am a data scientist, quantitative analyst, and an expert in the domains of statistical & econometric modelling, process analysis & design, and business decision support.

By profession, I am an execution-driven marketer with solid B2B & B2C acumen, specializing in Market, Customer & Competitive intelligence, Market & Consumer research techniques, insights-driven B2B Lead Generation, and Account-Based Marketing (ABM).

By nature, I am a curious scientist, enthusiastic about Technology & Humanity, passionate about developing knowledge, exploring uncharted territories, untangling complexities, and discovering the answers to the Big Questions.

Please reach out to me if you would like to engage in the dialogue! I am looking forward to getting in touch with you.

Business in Central and Eastern Europe

profile_positions.description: After 8.5 years at Philips Lighting / Signify, I decided to take a next step in my career and started my adventure with Healthcare Systems at Royal Philips. In my role I am responsible for globally transforming Philips marketing processes so that they are world-class efficient & 100% future-proof. Some of the processes I am responsible for are Account-Based Marketing, Key Opinion Leaders, Sales Enablement, Channel Marketing Activation, as well as a number of processes related to Marketing Intelligence, Marketing Advanced Analytics & Marketing Effectiveness Measurement.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager - B2B Marketing Execution, Global Marketing Transformation

profile_positions.description:
As a result of big success of my Enterprise B2B Marketing playbook short-term assignment, I was offered the role of Commercial Excellence Manager at Signify (formerly known as Philips Lighting). In the role, I act as Global Enterprise B2B Marketing Center of Excellence providing functional job leadership to Enterprise B2B Marketeers across the world in order to support the business growth in the enterprise commercial segments. 

Examples of daily responsibilities include:

- Experimenting with the E2E Marketing approaches yielding best results in the era of Digital Revolution.

- Ensuring competence development, process excellence and policy optimization & adherence within the global Enterprise B2B segments.

- Identifying global best practices, deploying them to the Enterprise B2B segments & ensuring adoption. 

-	Structurally researching all global Markets, synthesizing the key commercial findings and amplifying the voice of Customers & Markets towards Business Divisions and Functions.

-	Ensuring proper contextualization & quantification of customer value propositions across the global Markets.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Excellence Manager, Global Strategy & Marketing

profile_positions.description:
In November 2018, I moved from Signify CEE organization to Global Strategy & Marketing organization for the short-term assignment. Throughout 2019 I was based in Amsterdam and I was leading the global cross-functional effort to create & deploy "Enterprise B2B Marketing playbook" - an educational package globally standardizing the Enterprise B2B Marketing function and providing practical guidance how to achieve excellent performance in the role which is focusing on value proposition creation & business development for IoT-based, highly tailored Systems & Services offerings for Signify biggest customers.

Subsequently, I worked with 19 global Markets to ensure strong implementation, helping them understand & incorporate playbook-based way of working into their daily operational routine.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Excellence Specialist, Global Strategy & Marketing

profile_positions.description:
In the role of Market Intelligence Manager I was responsible for the entirety of CEE Market (17 countries) strategic analytics, market research & knowledge management efforts. I worked with all Business Divisions , Channels, and Geographies within CEE. My key objective was to build and maintain the solid market, customer and competitive insights generation system in order to inform strategic decisions in our ABM B2B Enterprise / Institutional B2G Marketing, B2B2B & B2B2C Channel Marketing approaches. I was also contributing strong Customer Intelligence foundation for Consultative Selling & Design Co-Creation approaches.

Throughout my tenure, I delivered many innovative & impactful projects, including numerous stretch assignments with International Key Account Management team, Strategic Planning & Market Insights department, Marketing Excellence department, and Digital Solutions division. I was very proud to have been recognized as the best Market Intelligence Manager in the global Philips Lighting organization.
profile_positions.title: Market Intelligence Manager CEE

profile_positions.description:
As a Market Intelligence & Digital Analyst I was responsible for delivering the projects related to the lighting market modelling, market research and statistical analyses of digital marketing effectiveness. I was instrumental for establishing the local approach to Enterprise B2B,  Lead Management, and Digital Analytics.

In view of my excellent record in this role, I was trusted to take up further challenges within the company, becoming virtually the youngest independent manager in Philips Lighting Europe and one of the youngest managers worldwide.
profile_positions.title: Market Intelligence & Digital Analyst

profile_positions.description:
The responsibilities in the position of CEE MT Support involved a general assistance to 4commercial directors managing the Central and Eastern Europe Market (17 countries). The directors were: Market Leader, Public Sector Sales Director, Professional Trade Director, and Marketing Director.

My main task was to ensure the operational excellence in the projects led by these commercial directors. Apart from that, some of my tasks included performing quantitative analyses of Polish lighting market, applying statistical tools in evaluating the efficiency of online marketing communication and managing change related to new CRM system: desgining commercial processes, measuring and supporting the adoption of the tool.
profile_positions.title: CEE Management Team Support

profile_positions.description:
DF sp. z o.o. was a small agency operating on the intersection of e-marketing and IT development. My role evolved throughout the time of my engagement in the company, starting from the position of CEO assistant, ending up as the project manager responsible for the development of a specialized ERP system for agricultural companies. I also worked a lot within Digital Marketing domain.

My tasks in the position involved: creating marketing strategies for customers of the company, FB community management (80k+ followers brand), analyzing Digital Marketing performance, coordinating project team effort (time and process management) as well as testing mobile applications.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Cooperation with CoachZone, training consortium operating in the field of coaching and personal training solutions was an opportunity to develop my soft skills regarding assertive communication, effective self-motivation tools and time management via regular personal coaching sessions. The supplementary cooperation involved event-based activites such as:
- supporting event organisation,
- preparing handouts and training materials,
- correcting documents,
profile_positions.title: Coachee / Volunteer

profile_positions.description: The summer internship in the Department of Corporate Banking, Investment Banking and Investment Markets of the second biggest banking institution in Poland allowed me to get acquainted with the corporate organization / way of working, obtain the applied knowledge of financial products and services and learn the basics of modern CRM systems.
profile_positions.title: Summer Intern
